Description: # FIXME why inverse of value of time? need better name?
# NOTE: Everything below is now done in tour_mode_choice via logsums...
# FIXME no transit subzones for ONE_ZONE version
Target: so all zones short walk to transit

Expression: reindex(land_use.access_dist_transit, df[orig_col_name]) if 'access_dist_transit' in land_use else shortWalk
reindex(land_use.access_dist_transit, df[dest_col_name]) if 'access_dist_transit' in land_use else shortWalk
origin_density.map({k: v for k, v in Taxi_waitTime_mean.items()})
origin_density.map({k: v for k, v in Taxi_waitTime_sd.items()})
dest_density.map({k: v for k, v in Taxi_waitTime_mean.items()})
dest_density.map({k: v for k, v in Taxi_waitTime_sd.items()})
Note that the mean and standard deviation are not the values for the distribution itself
column4: but of the underlying normal distribution it is derived from

Expression: rng.lognormal_for_df(df, mu=origin_zone_taxi_wait_time_mean, sigma=origin_zone_taxi_wait_time_sd, broadcast=True, scale=True).clip(min_waitTime, max_waitTime)
rng.lognormal_for_df(df, mu=dest_zone_taxi_wait_time_mean, sigma=dest_zone_taxi_wait_time_sd, broadcast=True, scale=True).clip(min_waitTime, max_waitTime)
origin_density.map({k: v for k, v in TNC_single_waitTime_mean.items()})
origin_density.map({k: v for k, v in TNC_single_waitTime_sd.items()})
dest_density.map({k: v for k, v in TNC_single_waitTime_mean.items()})
dest_density.map({k: v for k, v in TNC_single_waitTime_sd.items()})
rng.lognormal_for_df(df, mu=origin_zone_singleTNC_wait_time_mean, sigma=origin_zone_singleTNC_wait_time_sd, broadcast=True, scale=True).clip(min_waitTime, max_waitTime)
rng.lognormal_for_df(df, mu=dest_zone_singleTNC_wait_time_mean, sigma=dest_zone_singleTNC_wait_time_sd, broadcast=True, scale=True).clip(min_waitTime, max_waitTime)
origin_density.map({k: v for k, v in TNC_shared_waitTime_mean.items()})
origin_density.map({k: v for k, v in TNC_shared_waitTime_sd.items()})
dest_density.map({k: v for k, v in TNC_shared_waitTime_mean.items()})
dest_density.map({k: v for k, v in TNC_shared_waitTime_sd.items()})
rng.lognormal_for_df(df, mu=origin_zone_sharedTNC_wait_time_mean, sigma=origin_zone_sharedTNC_wait_time_sd, broadcast=True, scale=True).clip(min_waitTime, max_waitTime)
rng.lognormal_for_df(df, mu=dest_zone_sharedTNC_wait_time_mean, sigma=dest_zone_sharedTNC_wait_time_sd, broadcast=True, scale=True).clip(min_waitTime, max_waitTime)
reindex(land_use.PRKCST, df[dest_col_name]) #FIXME: Renamed OPRKCST to PRKCST
